mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memerStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_email=#{memberEmail} and member_pw=#{memberPw} and member_status=0
select member_email as memberEmail from member where member_name=#{memberName} and member_phone=#{memberPhone} and member_status=0

select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memerStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_email=#{memberEmail} and member_status=0

select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memerStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_nickname=#{memberNickname} and member_status=0
mapper.insert: insert into member values( member_seq.nextval, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberHbd}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPhone}, null, null, null, null, 0, 0, null, null, null, null, null, null, to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') )
mapper.update: update member set member_pw=#{memberPw} where member_email=#{memberEmail} and member_status=0
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_issued values( coupon_issued_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, 2, 0, sysdate, sysdate+30 )
mapper.select: select coupon_issued_no as couponIssouedNo, coupon_issued_member_no as couponIssuedMemberNo, coupon_issued_coupon_no as couponIssuedCouponNo, coupon_issued_check as couponIssuedCheck, coupon_issued_start as couponIssuedStart, coupon_issued_end as couponIssuedEnd, coupon_name as couponName, coupon_time_limit as couponTimeLimit, coupon_money as couponMoney, coupon_status as couponStatus, coupon_end as couponEnd, coupon_content as couponContent, coupon_img as couponImg, coupon_limit_money as couponLimitMoney from coupon_issued left join coupon on (coupon_issued_coupon_no=coupon_no) where coupon_issued_member_no=#{memberNo} and coupon_issued_check=0 and (to_date(coupon_issued_end)-sysdate)>0 and #{sellPrice}>coupon_limit_money;
select count(*) from member where member_level=1 and member_status=0

select g.* from (select rownum as rnum, f.* from (select distinct m.member_img as memberImg, m.member_nickname as memberNickname, m.member_intro as memberIntro, (select round(avg(review_point),1) from review where review_writer = m.member_nickname group by sell_no) as reviewPoint, (select review_content from review where review_no=(select max(review_no) from review where review_writer = (select member_nickname from member m1 where m1.member_no=m.member_no))) as reviewContent, (select review_no from review where review_no=(select max(review_no) from review where review_writer = (select member_nickname from member m1 where m1.member_no=m.member_no))) as reviewNo from member m left join sell s on (m.member_no = s.sell_writer) where member_level=1)f)g where rnum between 1 and 10;

select coupon_issued_no as couponIssouedNo, coupon_issued_member_no as couponIssuedMemberNo, coupon_issued_coupon_no as couponIssuedCouponNo, coupon_issued_check as couponIssuedCheck, coupon_issued_start as couponIssuedStart, coupon_issued_end as couponIssuedEnd, coupon_name as couponName, coupon_time_limit as couponTimeLimit, coupon_money as couponMoney, coupon_status as couponStatus, coupon_end as couponEnd, coupon_content as couponContent, coupon_img as couponImg, coupon_less_money as couponLessMoney from coupon_issued left join coupon on (coupon_issued_coupon_no=coupon_no) where coupon_issued_member_no=#{memberNo} and coupon_issued_check=0 and (to_date(coupon_issued_end)-sysdate)>0 and coupon_less_money<#{sellPrice}
